sourcesContent:
import * as React from 'react' import './pageNine.css' import Title from './components/title_bar' import Navbar from './components/nav_bar' import Font from './components/fnt_sze' export default function History(){ const [Lang,SetLang] = React.useState('EN'); let LangEN,LangDE; if(Lang === 'EN'){ LangEN = 'block' LangDE = 'none' } else if (Lang === 'DE'){ LangDE='block' LangEN='none' } const [Fntsze,SetFntsze]=React.useState(20) return(
<Navbar onUpdate={(value:string)=>SetLang(value)} pg_History='4px solid red'/> <div className = 'txt_box'> <h1 style={{display:LangEN}} className='h1_a' >History</h1> <h1 style={{display:LangDE}} className='h1_a'>Geschichte</h1> <Font fntSlct={(sze:number)=>SetFntsze(sze)} LangEN={LangEN} LangDE={LangDE}/> <hr></hr> <p style={{display:LangEN,fontSize:Fntsze}}> The first constitutional meeting of the International Club Juelich e.V. took place on March 8, 1970. <br></br> <br></br> The first committee board had seven members namely, Mrs. R. Kamat, Dr. Wald, Mr. Ahrens, Mr. Kedim, Mr. Galikine, Dr. Fischer and the town magistrate Mr. Schroeder. <br></br> <br></br> The club's constitution was accepted on Feb.15, 1972 and on March 24, 1972, the club was entered into the Register of Associations at the Juelich local court. At this time, the club has approximately 110 members, from twenty different countries. <br></br> <br></br> The first meetings were held at the "Old Town Hall", then shifted to the old engineering school (now the Fachhochschule), and finally at the Roncalli-Haus, until the construction of the guest house was completed in 1972. </p> <p style = {{display:LangDE, fontSize:Fntsze}}> Die konstituierende Sitzung des "Internationalen Clubs Jülich e.V." fand am 8. März 1970 statt. <br></br> <br></br> Der erste Vorstand mit sieben Mitgliedern war: Frau R.Kamat, Herr Dr. Wald, Herr Ahrens, Herr Kedim, Herr Galikine, Herr Dr. Fischer, Stadtdirektor Schröder. <br></br> <br></br> Die Satzung wurde am 15. Feb. 1972 errichtet. Der Tag der Eintragung ins Vereinsregister beim Amtsgericht Jülich erfolgte am 24. März 1972. Dem Club gehörten zu diesem Zeitpunkt nahezu 110 Mitglieder aus 20 Nationen an. <br></br> <br></br> Anfangs traf man sich noch im alten Rathaus der Stadt, hiernach in der alten Ingenieurschule (jetzige Fachhochschule) und dann im Roncalli-Haus - bis zum Bau des Gästehauses (1972). </p> <h1 style={{display:LangEN}} className='h1_b'>List of chairmen and vice-chairmen at the ICJ </h1> <h1 style={{display:LangDE}} className='h1_b'>Liste der Vorsitzenden und Vize-Vorsitzenden des ICJ </h1> <div className = 'grd_cont_history' style={{fontSize:Fntsze}}> <div style={{display:LangEN}}><b>Time Period</b></div> <div style={{display:LangEN}}><b>Chairman</b></div> <div style={{display:LangEN}}><b>Vice-Chairman</b></div> <div style={{display:LangDE}}><b>Zeitraum</b></div> <div style={{display:LangDE}}><b>Vorsitzender</b></div> <div style={{display:LangDE}}><b>Vize-Vorsitzender</b></div> <div >2020 - </div> <div>Mrs. M. Woischnik-De Buck</div> <div>Mr. R. Skowronek</div> <div>2018 - 2020</div> <div>Mrs. M. Peyser</div> <div>Mr. G. Schumacher</div> <div>2011 - 2018</div> <div>Mrs. S. Cowling</div> <div>Mrs. C. Prell-Zander</div> <div>2009 - 2011</div> <div>Mrs. V. Kentzinger</div> <div>Mrs. C. Prell-Zander</div> <div>2007 - 2009</div> <div>Mrs. H. Acker-Mantel</div> <div>Mr. W. Ullrich</div> <div>2005 - 2007</div> <div>Mrs. H. Acker-Mantel</div> <div>Mrs. B. Kobertz</div> <div>2003 - 2005</div> <div>Mrs. A. Conrad-Wienands</div> <div> Mrs. M. Brückel</div> <div>1999 - 2003</div> <div>Mrs. H. Grünberg</div> <div>Mrs. Shanta Gupta</div> <div >1995 - 1998</div> <div >Mrs. D. Eberhardt</div> <div >Mrs. A. Canty</div> <div >1993 - 1995</div> <div >Mrs. I. Wolf</div> <div >Mrs. M. v.Klitzing</div> <div >1989 - 1993</div> <div >Mrs. E. Meister</div> <div >Mrs. I. Wolf</div> <div >1985 - 1989</div> <div >Mrs. U. Kielhorn</div> <div >Mrs. I. Wolf</div> <div >1981 - 1985</div> <div >Mrs. M. Engelmann</div> <div >Mrs. H. Schult</div> <div >1975 - 1981</div> <div >Dr. M. Roeth-Kamat</div> <div >Mrs. I. Beckurts</div> <div >1973 - 1975</div> <div >Dr. K. Scharmer</div> <div >Dr. M. Roeth-Kamat</div> <div >1970 - 1973</div> <div >Dr. Wald</div> <div >Mr. V. Galikine</div> </div> </div> </div> ) }
